title: Calories in Yellow Squash
meta_description: Discover calories in yellow squash per 100g, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for this low-cal veggie.
assumptions: Raw, fresh yellow squash (summer squash variety); no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, freshness, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of yellow squash contains about 16 kcal and is rich in vitamins with minimal fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g yellow squash?
What nutrients are in yellow squash?
faqs.a: High in vitamin C and A; low in fat (0.2g) and protein (1.1g) per 100g.
Similar to raw at ~16 kcal per 100g if steamed without added fats.

faqs.q: How does yellow squash compare to zucchini?
faqs.a: Very similar; both ~16-17 kcal per 100g, interchangeable in recipes.
